Package peersim.kademlia

Class Summary
CustomDistribution This control initializes the whole network (that was already created by peersim) assigning a unique NodeId, randomly generated, to every node.
FindOperation This class represents a find operation and offer the methods needed to maintain and update the closest set.
It also maintains the number of parallel requsts that can has a maximum of ALPHA.
KademliaCommonConfig Fixed Parameters of a kademlia network.
KademliaObserver This class implements a simple observer of search time and hop average in finding a node in the network
KademliaProtocol  
KBucket This class implements a kademlia k-bucket.
Message Message class provide all functionalities to magage the various messages, principally LOOKUP messages (messages from application level sender destinated to another application level).
Types Of messages:
(application messages)
- MSG_LOOKUP: indicates that the body Object containes information to application level of the recipient

(service internal protocol messages)
- MSG_JOINREQUEST: message containing a join request of a node, the message is passed between many pastry nodes accorting to the protocol
- MSG_JOINREPLY: according to protocol, the body transport information related to a join reply message
- MSG_LSPROBEREQUEST:according to protocol, the body transport information related to a probe request message
- MSG_LSPROBEREPLY: not used in the current implementation
- MSG_SERVICEPOLL: internal message used to provide cyclic cleaning service of dead nodes
RoutingTable Gives an implementation for the rounting table component of a kademlia node
SimpleEvent This class defines a simple event.
StateBuilder Initialization class that performs the bootsrap filling the k-buckets of all initial nodes.
In particular every node is added to the routing table of every other node in the network.
Timeout This class represent a timeout event.
TrafficGenerator This control generates random search traffic from nodes to random destination node.
Turbulence Turbulcen class is only for test/statistical purpose.
UniformRandomGenerator This initializator assign to the Nodes a nodeId (stored in the protocol MSPastryProtocol) by using this 128-bit (32 byte) random generator.
Util Some utility and mathematical function to work with BigInteger numbers and strings.
